name: Stabman
description:
Our LD44 game's post-jam version, Stabman!  
This is the first post-jam project (and first game in general),
that we've properly finished,
and fifth game jam, that we didn't properly finish!

Read the full README, including controls, details about items, enemies, etc., on our GitHub repository:
https://github.com/Noah2610/LD44
Original LD44 jam page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/veggietartar
